body_html: @ezyang as Adam was saying, since all the problematic lines of code are inside asserts, if you compile with -DNDEBUG, they won't be seen by the compiler and the whole thing will compile without any problem. I am using a debug version of python locally, hence the problem.
body_text: @ezyang as Adam was saying, since all the problematic lines of code are inside asserts, if you compile with -DNDEBUG, they won't be seen by the compiler and the whole thing will compile without any problem. I am using a debug version of python locally, hence the problem.
body: @ezyang as Adam was saying, since all the problematic lines of code are inside `assert`s, if you compile with `-DNDEBUG`, they won't be seen by the compiler and the whole thing will compile without any problem. I am using a debug version of python locally, hence the problem.
